my_agent.title: My Agent
my_agent.description: A general-purpose conversational agent designed to assist with a wide range of tasks and queries.

sequential_workflow.title: Sequential Workflow
sequential_workflow.description: Processes tasks in a step-by-step sequence, ensuring each step completes before moving to the next.

parallel_workflow.title: Parallel Workflow
parallel_workflow.description: Executes multiple tasks simultaneously for faster processing and improved efficiency.

loop_workflow.title: Loop Workflow
loop_workflow.description: Iteratively processes tasks with multiple agents collaborating in cycles until completion.
